data.title: A Divided Life
data.meta_description: London: Heinemann, 1992. Autobiography INSCRIBED FIRST EDITION. Octavo 24 x 17cm , pp. 8 376. SIGNED by the author in black ink to fly-leaf. With three suites of eight double-sided black and white photographic plates. Publisher's grey cloth lettered in silver to spine. data.text:
FORBES, Bryan (1926 - 2013).

London: Heinemann, 1992. [Autobiography] INSCRIBED FIRST EDITION. Octavo (24 x 17cm), pp. [8] 376. SIGNED by the author in black ink to fly-leaf. With three suites of eight double-sided black and white photographic plates. Publisher's grey cloth lettered in silver to spine. With the photographic dust-jacket designed by Terry O'Neill, priced at £16.99. Ex libris stamp front paste down, some toning to edges of pages, toning to edges of textblock. Very good. Forbes spent most of his career working within the film-production and was the head of production at EMI. This autobiography provides a rare insight into the film industry and Forbes' most turbulent and exciting years of his life. Item #63438

Price: £30.00
